name: Project XZ27
description:
**Please download MacOS or Windows versions for full experience. Many features are unsupported on WebGL build, so please consider downloading executable files. Thank you**

There has been a tragic disaster in space lab GZXX420. Project XZ27 went sideways when performing experimental genetic modifications on aliens. You have been hired to eliminate this impending threat to the human race. Equipped with the latest gravity modification technology and your space blaster, you must completely eradicate this race of uncontrollably multiplying space creatures or else the survival of the human race is at risk. 

Controls: w, a, s, d: move, left click: shoot, space: jump, shift: sprint, p: pause

Gravity modification controls: normal downward gravity: 1,  upward gravity: 2, horizontal gravity: 3,4,5,6 (see visual in-game)
